verses.roman:
ṣoḍaśe-vṛndāvana-yātrā gauḍa-deśa-pathe
punaḥ nīlācale āilā, nāṭaśālā haite

synonyms: ṣoḍaśe—in the Sixteenth Chapter; vṛndāvana-yātrā—departure for visiting Vṛndāvana; gauḍa-deśa-pathe—on the way through the province of Bengal; punaḥ—again; nīlācale āilā—came back to Jagannātha Purī; nāṭaśālā haite—from Kānāi Nāṭaśālā.
translation: In the Sixteenth Chapter Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu departed for Vṛndāvana and journeyed through Bengal. He later returned to Jagannātha Purī from Kānāi Nāṭaśālā.
